the_warlord:FencingBoots.NAME: Fencing Boots
the_warlord:FencingBoots.FLAVOR: You are the fencing queen, young and ascension 17...
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b2 the_warlord:Posture.

the_warlord:MedicPouch.NAME: Medic Pouch
the_warlord:MedicPouch.FLAVOR: A Swordfight a day keeps the doctor away! Or does it?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add #b2 #ySyrettes to your hand.

the_warlord:PocketKnife.NAME: Pocket Knife
DESCRIPTIONS: You can now have #b4 Parry cards instead of #b3 to choose from.

the_warlord:ParryingDagger.NAME: Parrying Dagger
the_warlord:ParryingDagger.FLAVOR: Because when was dual wielding not cool, huh?
DESCRIPTIONS: The first #yParry card you play in combat is played twice.

the_warlord:PaperScorpion.NAME: Paper Scorpion
the_warlord:PaperScorpion.FLAVOR: Watch out or you get a bleeding paper cut!
DESCRIPTIONS: the_warlord:Bleed on enemies with the_warlord:Gush is multiplied by #b2 instead of #b1.5.

the_warlord:StrategyGuide.NAME: StrategyGuide
the_warlord:StrategyGuide.FLAVOR: Find out how to Beat Heart in 4 turns
DESCRIPTIONS: On pickup, choose a #yParry card to add to your deck.

the_warlord:FeatherBoots.NAME: Feather Boots
DESCRIPTIONS: #rReplaces #rFencing #rBoots. NL At the start of combat, gain #b5 the_warlord:Posture.

the_warlord:SamuraiSword.NAME: Samurai Sword
the_warlord:SamuraiSword.FLAVOR: The last of the 7 famous swords.
